mapper.select: select annual_give from annual where user_no = #{userNo} and annual_date between (trunc(sysdate, 'yyyy')) and (add_months(trunc(sysdate, 'year'), 12) -1)

select count(vacation_count) from document do left join annual a on(a.user_no = do.user_no) left join vacation v on(v.document_no = do.document_no) left join approval ap on(ap.document_no = do.document_no) where user_no = #{userNo} and ap.status = '승인' and a.annual_date between (trunc(sysdate, 'yyyy')) and (add_months(trunc(sysdate, 'year'), 12) -1)

select count(annual_give) - count(vacation_count) as holidayCount from document do left join annual a on(a.user_no = do.user_no) left join vacation v on(v.document_no = do.document_no) left join approval ap on(ap.document_no = do.document_no) where user_no = #{userNo} and ap.status = '승인' and a.annual_date between (trunc(sysdate, 'yyyy')) and (add_months(trunc(sysdate, 'year'), 12) -1)

select to_char(do.create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as create_date , nvl(v.vacation_category, '-') as vacation_category , do.document_content , nvl(v.vacation_start || '~' || vacation_end, '-') as vacation_date , v.vacation_count , DECODE(ap.status, '0', '결재대기', '승인', '승인', '반려', '반려') as ap_status from document do left join vacation v on(v.document_no = do.document_no) left join approval ap on(ap.document_no = do.document_no) where do.user_no = #{userNo} order by 1 desc

select nvl(sum(work_use), 0) as work_use from document join attendance using(user_no) join work using(document_no) where user_no = #{userNo} and work_date between (TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH')) and (LAST_DAY(SYSDATE))

select 60 - nvl(sum(work_use),0) as work_user from document left join attendance using(user_no) left join work using(document_no) where user_no = #{userNo} and work_date between (TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH')) and (LAST_DAY(SYSDATE))

select count(work_use) from document left join attendance using(user_no) left join work using(document_no) where user_no = #{userNo} and at_date between (TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH')) and (LAST_DAY(SYSDATE))

select do.user_no , work_date , at_day , nvl(wo.work_start || '~' || wo.work_end, '-') as work_dateList , do.document_content , wo.work_use , DECODE(ap.status, '0', '결재대기', '승인', '승인', '반려', '반려') as ap_status from document do left join attendance at on(at.user_no = do.user_no) left join approval ap on(ap.document_no = do.document_no) left join work wo on(wo.document_no = do.document_no) where do.user_no = #{userNo}

select count(*) from attendance at join member m on (at.user_no = m.user_no) where
(m.dep_name = '개발팀' or m.dep_name = '영업팀' or m.dep_name = '인사팀' or m.dep_name = '총무팀' or m.dep_name = '회계팀')
m.dep_name = '개발팀'
m.dep_name = '영업팀'
m.dep_name = '인사팀'
m.dep_name = '총무팀'
m.dep_name = '회계팀'
and m.user_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select at_date , at_day , m.user_no , m.dep_name , m.user_name , m.job_name , nvl(at_start, '-') as at_start , nvl(at_end, '-') as at_end , decode(at_status, 1, '정상', 2, '지각', 3, '휴가', 4, '결근') as at_status from attendance at join member m on (at.user_no = m.user_no) where
(m.dep_name = '개발팀' or m.dep_name = '영업팀' or m.dep_name = '인사팀' or m.dep_name = '총무팀' or m.dep_name = '회계팀')
m.dep_name = '개발팀'
m.dep_name = '영업팀'
m.dep_name = '인사팀'
m.dep_name = '총무팀'
m.dep_name = '회계팀'
and m.user_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by at_date desc

select count(*) from ( select distinct m.user_no from member m left join document do on(m.user_no = do.user_no) left join vacation v on(v.document_no = do.document_no) where
(m.dep_name = '개발팀' or m.dep_name = '영업팀' or m.dep_name = '인사팀' or m.dep_name = '총무팀' or m.dep_name = '회계팀')
m.dep_name = '개발팀'
m.dep_name = '영업팀'
m.dep_name = '인사팀'
m.dep_name = '총무팀'
m.dep_name = '회계팀'
and (m.job_name = '부장' or m.job_name = '팀장' or m.job_name = '과장' or m.job_name = '대리' or m.job_name = '사원')
and m.job_name = '부장'
and m.job_name = '팀장'
and m.job_name = '과장'
and m.job_name = '대리'
and m.job_name = '사원'
and m.user_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' and m.status = 'N')

select m.user_no , m.dep_name , m.user_name , m.job_name , m.create_date , trunc(months_between(sysdate, m.create_date)/12) as service_year , nvl(sum(vacation_count), 0) as vacation_count from member m left join document do on(m.user_no = do.user_no) left join vacation v on(v.document_no = do.document_no) where
(m.dep_name = '개발팀' or m.dep_name = '영업팀' or m.dep_name = '인사팀' or m.dep_name = '총무팀' or m.dep_name = '회계팀')
m.dep_name = '개발팀'
m.dep_name = '영업팀'
m.dep_name = '인사팀'
m.dep_name = '총무팀'
m.dep_name = '회계팀'
and (m.job_name = '부장' or m.job_name = '팀장' or m.job_name = '과장' or m.job_name = '대리' or m.job_name = '사원')
and m.job_name = '부장'
and m.job_name = '팀장'
and m.job_name = '과장'
and m.job_name = '대리'
and m.job_name = '사원'
and m.user_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' and m.status = 'N' group by m.user_no, m.dep_name, m.user_name, m.job_name, m.create_date order by user_no desc
